price: 34. Waxaana la odhan: Maanta waan idin halmaameynaa (idiinka tegi Naarta) sida aad u halmaanteen la Kulanka Maalintiinnaan (aydaan ugu diyaar garoobin Towxiid iyo camallo san), hoygiinnuna waa Naarta, mana jiro cid idiin soo gargaari.
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰكُمۡ كَمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqīla al-yawma nansākum kamā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā wamawākumu al-nāru wamā lakum min nāṣirīna
